snippet: A former National Basketball Association player famed for delivering a devastating punch during a 1977 on-court fight has been arrested and charged with fraud in conspiracy with a National Football League Hall of Famer, U.S. prosecutors said on We...
lead_paragraph: A former National Basketball Association player famed for delivering a devastating punch during a 1977 on-court fight has been arrested and charged with fraud in conspiracy with a National Football League Hall of Famer, U.S. prosecutors said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Former NBA, NFL Players Charged in Tax Fraud Scheme
headline.print_headline: Former NBA, NFL Players Charged in Tax Fraud Scheme
